name: Ladder.io
description:
Welcome to Ladder.io, a fun runner game in which you compete with others to be the first at the end of the track. When you reach the end, you jump as far as you can with help of the jetpack power. You will collect jetpack fuel based on how well you place your ladder. With jetpack you can jump on the platform without having to place a ladder.

During the game you will collect coins. With coins you can upgrade your gliding speed and valley depth to boost your final score!

Try your luck and get rewards every day by spinning the Lucky Wheel. You can increase your rewards by claiming prizes every day.

Compete with other players and show them who is the true master in this colorful and fun game!
